comments: Tests covering the use of the CEIL function.

tests.name: returns the ceil number of an integer, a bigint, and a double
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a INT, b BIGINT, c DOUBLE) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT CEIL(a) as A, CEIL(b) as B, CEIL(c) as C FROM TEST;
